trailingComments.value:
*
 * A dot screen shader material.
 *
 * @class DotScreenMaterial
 * @submodule materials
 * @extends ShaderMaterial
 * @constructor
 * @param {Boolean} [average=false] - Whether the shader should output the colour average (black and white).
